name: gocron
description: GoCron is a self-hosted cron web UI and API for scheduling jobs. It offers job logs, history, a scheduler interface, and runs as a lightweight web server on local systems.
features: Web-Based Scheduler: Manage cron jobs through an intuitive web interface instead of crontab files.
Job History: View execution history, logs, and status for all scheduled tasks.
Execution Logs: Capture stdout and stderr from job runs for debugging and monitoring.
Flexible Scheduling: Define schedules using cron syntax or simple interval-based timing.
Job Management: Create, edit, enable, disable, and delete scheduled jobs from the UI.
API Access: Programmatically manage jobs via REST API for automation and integration.
Lightweight Server: Minimal resource requirements suitable for always-on operation.
Email Notifications: Receive alerts when jobs fail or complete successfully.
